title: Color Palette Editing and Visualizing
text: Expand beautiful (short) color palettes favorite palette package.   U.S. Department Commerce | National Oceanographic Atmospheric Administration | NOAA Fisheries
code: library(RColorBrewer) library(palettehelper)   pal <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(n = 6,name = "PuBuGn") longer_pal <- palettehelper::lengthen_pal(shortpal = pal, newlength = 20) print(longer_pal) #>  [1] "#F6EFF7" "#ECE7F2" "#E2DFEE" "#D8D7E9" "#CDCFE5" "#C2CAE2" "#B7C5DF" #>  [8] "#ACC0DC" "#9FBAD9" "#8EB5D6" "#7EB0D3" "#6DABD0" "#5BA5C6" "#479EB8" #> [15] "#3397AA" "#1F919B" "#16888B" "#0F7E7A" "#087569" "#016C59"  par(mfrow=c(1,2)) scales::show_col(pal) scales::show_col(longer_pal)
